casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1942.

(May 4, 1942.) Cloudy Realty Corporation and Others, Appellants, v. Albert C. Allen and Others, Respondents, and Others, Defendants.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Hagarty, Johnston, Adel and Close, JJ.
